turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I wanted to see if I could order some pizza from Marco's at the location nearest to me in Carrollton, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Is that the location on 2201 Marsh Ln?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order one XXL Deluxe pizza and one Large Grilled Chicken Florentine pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just so you know the largest size at Marcos is XL. Would you like the Deluxe pizza to be an XL?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. And is there anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would also like to add an order of Cinnasquares.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So you want two pizzas, an XL Deluxe pizza and a Large Grilled Chicken Florentine pizza. And you would also like an order of Cinnasquares?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let me get the price for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When checking the price it looks like the Cinnasquares are unavailable. Would you like to add something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Can I add an order of Cheezybread?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that's available. So, to repeat, I have one XL Deluxe pizza, one Large Grilled Chicken Florentine pizza, and an order of Cheezybread. Does that sound right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me get the price for you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like it will come to $27.83.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what name will you be using to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The pick up name will be Jennifer Long.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your pizza should be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great rest of the day.

items.name: nearest to me in Carrollton, Texas
